original_text: Now when the king lived in his house and the Lord had given him rest from all his surrounding enemies,
korean_text: 여호와께서 주위의 모든 원수를 무찌르사 왕으로 궁에 평안히 살게 하신 때에

sentences.original_text: Now when the king lived in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 왕이 자기 집에 살 때

sentences.original_text: and the Lord had given him rest
